snippet: Ban Ki-moon, the United Nations secretary general, said a suspended observer mission should not be disbanded but instead should work to encourage a political solution in Syria.
lead_paragraph: Ban Ki-moon, the United Nations secretary general, said a suspended observer mission should not be disbanded but instead should work to encourage a political solution in Syria.

headline.seo: Ban Ki-moon Proposes Changing Purpose of Syria Monitor Mission
headline.main: Leader of U.N. Proposes New Role for Monitors in Syria
headline.print_headline: Secretary General Proposes Changing Purpose of Syria Monitor Mission

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
